title: Hextech
body: Hey is hextech crafting coming in a later patch. Jus wondering.

replies.body:
Because its still being tested for a number of things. Obvious bugs, how well it works, how easy it is for people to use but most importantly, how will being able to unlock free champions and skins effect Riot's bottom line.

I believe it is currently live on Turkish servers for (4 weeks of) testing.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/02/red-post-collection-happy-valentines.html#9
